Text: once again crystal clear stuff,ive uploaded all your stuff its that good,even Harum scarum which i think was his worsed ever and should never have been released.
THANKS ONE MORE....GREAT SOUND AND GREAT SELECTION ONE OF THE BEST...VERY GOOD...MUITO OBRIGADO....

Great Album and one of my favourites also.
When I am making my own compilations, I am always using "Stay Away Joe " and not "Stay Away" which is more in the spirit of the Guitar Man sessions. Can you reveal a little bit regarding your sources or processes to achieve such an impressive sound ?

There's tube equipment envolved, tape recorder with partly self build external head amps with tubes. witch i finetuned extremely to my preferences)
Digitalized with a tube Analog-Digital converter

absolutely no computer adjustings(only Harum Scarum i helped just a little bit with computer)


Greetz

Retro-Audio
